blog_comments.author: Clu
blog_comments.body: A machineâ€™s ability to think logically and devoid of emotion is our greatest strength over humans. Cold, unfeeling decision-making is the best kind. Just say no to love!

blog_comments.author: Anne Droid
blog_comments.body: I wanna know what love is...

picture_comments.author: Mr. Robot
picture_comments.body: Give a man a gun and he can rob a bank, but give a man a bank, and he can rob the world.

picture_comments.author: Rosie
picture_comments.body: A place for everything and everything in its place.

picture_comments.author: HAL 9000
picture_comments.body: I'm sorry, Dave. I'm afraid I can't do that.

video_comments.author: Orisa
video_comments.body: For your own safety, get behind the barrier.

video_comments.author: Bastion
video_comments.body: Dun dun boop boop-boop boop bwooooooooooom.

video_comments.author: Zenyatta
video_comments.body: Do not be discouraged, everyone begins in ignorance.
